00008 
00009 #ifndef BOOST_TT_ADD_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00010 #define BOOST_TT_ADD_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
00011 
00012 #include "boost/type_traits/remove_reference.hpp"
00013 
00014 // should be the last #include
00015 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/type_trait_def.hpp"
00016 
00017 namespace boost {
00018 
00019 namespace detail {
00020 
00021 #if defined(__BORLANDC__) && (__BORLANDC__ < 0x600)
00022 //
00023 // For some reason this implementation stops Borlands compiler
00024 // from dropping cv-qualifiers, it still fails with references
00025 // to arrays for some reason though (shrug...) (JM 20021104)
00026 //
00027 template <typename T>
00028 struct add_pointer_impl
00029 {
00030     typedef T* type;
00031 };
00032 template <typename T>
00033 struct add_pointer_impl<T&>
00034 {
00035     typedef T* type;
00036 };
00037 template <typename T>
00038 struct add_pointer_impl<T&const>
00039 {
00040     typedef T* type;
00041 };
00042 template <typename T>
00043 struct add_pointer_impl<T&volatile>
00044 {
00045     typedef T* type;
00046 };
00047 template <typename T>
00048 struct add_pointer_impl<T&const volatile>
00049 {
00050     typedef T* type;
00051 };
00052 
00053 #else
00054 
00055 template <typename T>
00056 struct add_pointer_impl
00057 {
00058     typedef typename remove_reference<T>::type no_ref_type;
00059     typedef no_ref_type* type;
00060 };
00061 
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 } // namespace detail
00065 
00066 BOOST_TT_AUX_TYPE_TRAIT_DEF1(add_pointer,T,typename detail::add_pointer_impl<T>::type)
00067 
00068 } // namespace boost
00069 
00070 #include "boost/type_traits/detail/type_trait_undef.hpp"
00071 
00072 #endif // BOOST_TT_ADD_POINTER_HPP_INCLUDED
